snippet: Surveillance cameras set up by Jabbar Campbell, who said the police beat him in January, captured plainclothes officers entering his building again last week.
abstract: Internal Affairs Bureau at the New York Police Department is looking into an assertion that officers unlawfully entered and searched Crown Heights, Brooklyn, apartment belonging to Jabbar Campbell, who had accused officers of assaulting him in his building.
lead_paragraph: Surveillance cameras set up by Jabbar Campbell, who said the police beat him in January, captured plainclothes officers entering his building again last week.

headline.seo: Internal Affairs Investigating Officers for Visit Made After Assault Accusations
headline.main: Inquiry Into Officers After They Visit Man Who Accused Police of Assault
headline.print_headline: Inquiry Into Officers After They Visit Man Who Accused Police of Assault
